description.overview: Doctors are the lifeblood of any team, keeping allies in fighting shape and turning the tides of battle with their medical expertise. They are as skilled with a scalpel as they are with nanoprograms, making them vital for any mission requiring endurance and recovery.
description.signature_description:
When any character uses Edge. Doctors can Focus to diagnose a target, applying a medical mark that reveals key vulnerabilities or potential cures and symptoms.

Mark Utilization: Consuming the mark enhances the next nanoprogram, whether for healing, debuffing, or damaging.

Strategic Application: Requires tactical decision-making to maximize the effectiveness of the mark.

programs.name: Complete Healing
programs.effect: Completely restores health, vital for critical situations.

programs.name: Team Heal
programs.effect: Area-of-effect healing for all nearby team members.

programs.name: Defibrillate
programs.description: Capable of reviving incapacitated allies, crucial in battle.

skills.name: Preventative Medicine
skills.description: Enhancing allies' resistance and preventive health care.

programs.name: Superior First Aid
programs.description: Significantly boosts the target's Treatment Skill for enhanced healing.
programs.effect: Significantly boosts the target's Treatment Skill by 2+.

skills.name: Toxicology
skills.description: Offensive medical nanotech for weakening enemies

programs.name: Uncontrollable Body Tremors (UBT)
programs.effect: Causes damaging tremors in enemies, reducing their combat effectiveness.

programs.name: Neurological Disruption
programs.effect: Disorients enemies, impairing their combat skills.

programs.name: Metabolic Corruption
programs.effect: Reduces enemy attack and movement speed.
